title: Software Engineering Internship
shortDescription: Gain hands-on experience building scalable web applications and working with modern frameworks in a collaborative engineering team.
description: Join TechNova’s engineering team and contribute to the development of scalable, production-ready web applications. You will work with modern frameworks, participate in code reviews, implement new features, fix bugs, and collaborate closely with senior engineers following agile methodologies. This internship provides hands-on experience in full-stack development, cloud deployment workflows, and best practices for writing clean, maintainable code.
requirements: Basic knowledge of JavaScript, Python, or Java
Familiarity with React, Node.js, or similar frameworks
Understanding of version control (Git)
Problem-solving mindset and willingness to learn
Ability to work in a collaborative team environment

title: Marketing & Communications Internship
shortDescription: Support marketing campaigns, social media management, and audience analysis for a dynamic media company.
description: Support BrightWave Media’s branding and outreach efforts by helping plan, execute, and analyze marketing campaigns. You will create engaging content for social platforms, assist in drafting communication materials, track audience analytics, and brainstorm creative strategies to increase digital visibility. This internship is perfect for students interested in content creation, branding psychology, and digital marketing trends.
requirements: Strong writing and communication skills
Familiarity with social media platforms
Basic understanding of Canva, Photoshop, or similar tools
Creativity and interest in digital content creation
Ability to analyze engagement metrics

title: Finance Analyst Internship
shortDescription: Assist financial analysts in evaluating company performance, market trends, and investment opportunities.
description: Work alongside CapitalCore’s financial analysts to evaluate company performance, study market movements, and assist in preparing financial models and reports. You will help analyze datasets, assess investment risks, and contribute to industry research. This internship offers exposure to portfolio analysis, valuation methods, and real-world decision-making within investment and corporate finance.
requirements: Strong analytical and numerical skills
Proficiency in Excel or Google Sheets
Interest in finance, investing, or economics
Attention to detail
Ability to interpret financial data

title: Graphic Design Internship
shortDescription: Collaborate with designers to create branding assets, posters, and digital media content in a creative studio.
description: Collaborate with senior designers to produce high-quality branding materials, digital assets, posters, and social media visuals. You will participate in concept development, typography selection, layout design, and iterative revisions based on team feedback. This role is perfect for creatives looking to strengthen their visual storytelling skills and gain real-world experience using Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, and Figma.
requirements: Basic proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator, or Figma
Creativity and strong visual sense
Portfolio or examples of previous design work
Understanding of branding and layout principles
Ability to follow visual guidelines

title: Environmental Research Assistant
shortDescription: Assist with sustainability projects, environmental data collection, and campus green initiatives.
description: Assist researchers and sustainability coordinators in collecting, organizing, and analyzing environmental data for ongoing green initiatives. You'll contribute to field surveys, environmental reporting, and sustainability projects aimed at reducing ecological impact on campus. This internship is ideal for students passionate about climate science, environmental policy, and real-world ecological research.
requirements: Interest in environmental science or sustainability
Ability to conduct fieldwork and collect data
Basic research or report-writing skills
Attention to environmental detail
Team-oriented mindset

title: Data Science Internship
shortDescription: Build predictive models, clean datasets, and create visualizations alongside experienced data scientists.
description: Join Insight Analytics’ data science team to build predictive models, clean and process large datasets, and create insightful visualizations. You will work with machine learning workflows, develop analytical dashboards, and support ongoing research projects. This internship provides practical experience in Python, data pipelines, feature engineering, and communicating data-driven insights.
requirements: Basic Python programming skills
Familiarity with Pandas, NumPy, or similar libraries
Interest in machine learning or analytics
Ability to understand datasets and charts
Strong logical and quantitative skills

title: Public Relations Internship
shortDescription: Assist with press releases, media relations, and event coordination in a dynamic PR environment.
description: Support City PR’s communications team by preparing media kits, drafting press releases, coordinating client events, and monitoring public sentiment. You'll help manage relationships with journalists, contribute to PR campaigns, and track coverage across digital platforms. This internship is perfect for students interested in strategic communication, branding reputation, and event coordination.
requirements: Strong writing and communication abilities
Comfortable speaking with media professionals
Interest in PR, branding, or communications
Organizational skills for managing events
Ability to stay calm under deadlines

title: UX/UI Design Internship
shortDescription: Design user-centered interfaces, create prototypes, and conduct usability testing for digital products.
description: Assist the product design team in creating intuitive, user-centered digital experiences. You will design wireframes, prototype interfaces, conduct usability testing, and gather user feedback to improve product flows. This role is ideal for aspiring designers seeking hands-on experience with Figma, design systems, user research, and modern UX/UI methodologies.
requirements: Basic knowledge of UX/UI principles
Ability to use Figma or similar tools
Strong interest in product design
Creativity and problem-solving mindset
Ability to conduct or observe user testing

title: Biomedical Engineering Internship
shortDescription: Work with engineers developing and testing medical devices and prototypes in a research lab.
description: Work with biomedical engineers to design, test, and refine medical device prototypes. You'll assist with laboratory experiments, data collection, device calibration, and documentation required for regulatory compliance. This internship provides exposure to biomedical instrumentation, prototyping tools, and the innovation pipeline behind next-generation healthcare technology.
requirements: Interest in biomedical engineering or life sciences
Comfort working in a lab environment
Basic technical or engineering knowledge
Attention to mechanical and analytical details
Ability to document experimental results accurately

title: Education Outreach Internship
shortDescription: Support community learning programs, tutor students, and assist in organizing educational workshops.
description: Support educational outreach programmes by assisting with tutoring sessions, developing learning materials, and organizing workshops for students. You will help design engaging curriculum resources, coordinate community events, and work closely with educators to assess learning progress. This internship is suited for students interested in teaching, curriculum development, community service, or nonprofit education work.
requirements: Interest in teaching or community education
Good communication and teamwork skills
Ability to work with students of different ages
Organizational skills for event coordination
Patience and a supportive attitude
